algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the ratio of the average of the last 10 days' closing prices to the average of the next 10 days' high prices, then applies an exponential moving average for smoothing.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    # Calculate the average of the last 10 days' closing prices
    avg_last_10_close = df['close'].rolling(window=10).mean()
    # Calculate the average of the next 10 days' high prices
    avg_next_10_high = df['high'].shift(-10).rolling(window=10).mean()
    # Calculate the factor as the ratio of the two averages
    factor_values = avg_last_10_close / avg_next_10_high
    # Apply an exponential moving average for smoothing the factor values
    smoothed_factor = factor_values.ewm(span=10, adjust=False).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = smoothed_factor.dropna()
    return heuristics_matrix
